Introduction: ^You've put away your things and began to explore! You start by walking into a cute convenience store.
^You want to ask about the best places to eat, so you walk over to the counter and speak to the person serving.
start:
^"Hej, hur mår du?"
"Hi, how are you?"
^Hi, I've only just got here, so I'm a little nervous...
^Hej, jag mår bra tack, och du?
confident:
^"Hej, jag mår bra tack, och du?"
"Hi, I'm good thank you, and you?"

^"Jag mår också bra tack! Hur kan jag hjälpa?"
"I'm good too thank you! How can I help?"
beginner: ^"Hi, I've only just got here, so I'm a little nervous..."
^"Oh, that's okay! Welcome to Stockholm. Did you want me to teach you some Swedish basics to get you started?
